overview: Marty, a middle-aged man, awakens to his life and doesn't like what he sees. After attending the theater with his wife and co-worker, Marty's long-buried love of the arts is stirred. Facing great odds from his wife and family, he takes a risk and auditions for a play. Without realizing it, Marty has set his life on a new trajectory from which there is no return. A trajectory that is often funny, yet heartbreaking.
title: Future Perfect
